title: Galactic Nsus recall
body: Doesn't show the usual 'beam me up' effects.

replies.body:
Hey Empress Unicorn, 

As CastPrizm mentioned below, Galactic Nasus is a 520 RP skin, he won't have a custom recall animation. Instead, he uses base Nasus' recall. I checked both the base and Galactic, and they both appear to be playing the recall animation properly.
Only 975 skins and above give new recall animations. Galactic Nasus is a 520 RP skin(I think). Sorry :( . If you like beam up effects, then Galactic Azir is good.
I see. Thanks for the speedy response! I guess I must have been a little confused about what does/doesn't have a pretty recall. Thanks!
